messages.subject: Re: list of 11 misconceptions
messages.msgSnippet: When you say its all untrue, you mean all the misconceptions are, in fact, correct? That is, there were in fact ninja with straight swords and the samurai did
messages.messageBody:
When you say its all untrue, you mean all the misconceptions are, in
fact, correct? That is, there were in fact ninja with straight swords
and the samurai did refuse to use the 'coward's weapon' gun? If this
is what you mean, please state your scholarly sources. Otherwise, you
need to accept the truth of those misconceptions quick. <g>

messages.subject: list of 11 misconceptions
messages.msgSnippet: konnichiwa!i reaqd the list .i didnt understand why,because all 11 are not true.but lets begin.i have to said that im so very bad with computers.they normally
messages.messageBody:
konnichiwa!i reaqd the "list".i didnt understand why,because all 11 are
not true.but lets begin.i have to said that im so very bad with
computers.they normally dont work with me.so im hoping to get through to
you!an other warning;english is not my native language,so there is going
to be lot of misstakes!now my first question:i need to read theNITEN-KI
chronick by Shinmen Musashi.have anybody read it?is it in english?how
can i get it(if it is in english)?iv been trying to get the book over 20
years,so PLEASE,HELP me somebody!!!ill be ever gratefull!!yours truly
JORE from Finland
